attributes.action: Lower The Two Fuel Taxes on Petrol Prices
attributes.additional_details: The cost of living is increasing extremely, along with fuel prices which is not stopping and the wages are not increasing to counter this. The government should be taking the hit of the increase in fuel prices as the general public are not able to along with increases in energy prices and the government are doing nothing substantial to help the general public which is the whole reason they are meant to be here and the whole reason we pay taxes so that they can improve our quality of life…
attributes.background: I want the government to lower the two taxes that they put on the extortionate petrol prices .

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567

Remove duty on motor fuel completely: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908

Temporarily suspend all taxes on all fuels and energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610585
